humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report provides the size of the largest tumor as 4.7 cm by 2.5 cm by 2.0 cm. According to the rules provided, T2 tumors are more than 2 cm but not more than 5 cm. Therefore, the T stage for this patient's cancer is T2.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that the tumor involves the dermis of the nipple and is associated with Paget's disease of the nipple (T4b) and that the tumor extends to within 0.2 cm of the deep margin. These findings support a T4 stage.
